001package org.nasdanika.resources;
002
003import java.io.InputStream;
004import java.util.Map;
005
006import org.nasdanika.common.ProgressMonitor;
007
008/**
009 * Delegates all calls to the target. Wraps return types of getContainer() and getParent() into {@link BinaryContainerImpl}.
010 * @author Pavel
011 *
012 */
013public class BinaryContainerImpl implements BinaryContainer {
014
015        private Container<InputStream> target;
016
017        public BinaryContainerImpl(Container<InputStream> target) {
018                this.target = target;
019        }
020
021        public Object find(String path, ProgressMonitor monitor) {
022                return target.find(path, monitor);
023        }
024
025        public InputStream get(String path, ProgressMonitor monitor) {
026                return target.get(path, monitor);
027        }
028
029        public void put(String path, InputStream element, ProgressMonitor monitor) throws IllegalArgumentException {
030                target.put(path, element, monitor);
031        }
032
033        public void copy(Container<? super InputStream> container, String path, ProgressMonitor monitor) {
034                target.copy(container, path, monitor);
035        }
036
037        public Object delete(String path, ProgressMonitor monitor) {
038                return target.delete(path, monitor);
039        }
040
041        public void move(Container<? super InputStream> container, String path, ProgressMonitor monitor) {
042                target.move(container, path, monitor);
043        }
044
045        public BinaryContainer getContainer(String path, ProgressMonitor monitor) {
046                Container<InputStream> c = target.getContainer(path, monitor);
047                return c == null ? null : new BinaryContainerImpl(c);
048        }
049
050        public Map<String, Object> getChildren(ProgressMonitor monitor) {
051                return target.getChildren(monitor);
052        }
053
054        public BinaryContainer getParent() {
055                Container<InputStream> parent = target.getParent();
056                return parent == null ? null : new BinaryContainerImpl(parent);
057        }
058
059        public String getName() {
060                return target.getName();
061        }
062
063}
